snippet.title: GRIME Colors of Rot Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
GRIME is now available on PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1123050/GRIME/

The Colors of Rot FREE DLC is coming to PC, and will be bundled into the launch of GRIME on Switch (date TBA), as well as the newly announced releases on Xbox One, Xbox Series, PS4 and PS5 consoles!

Explore a huge new area full of new enemies, weapons, bosses, and additional story and lore. Gain new abilities that will allow you to traverse the world of GRIME faster and more flexibly than ever before from gigantic bosses that will truly test your skills, with memorable new tracks and effects from Alex Roe and Sean Secca.
